section.title: The kaarpux/linux directory
section.para: The kaarpux/linux directory is created by kaarpux/master/make_scripts.sh and will contain the files needed to build &kx; on the target system.

listitem.para: Each package gets unpacked and build in a subdirectory.
Scripts which are used when building &kx; on the target system. Populated by kaarpux/master/make_scripts.sh.
During building, each step is logged in a file in this directory.
